thread.title: Marty Ingels, husband of Shirley Jones, dies at 79
thread.title_full: Marty Ingels, husband of Shirley Jones, dies at 79

title: Marty Ingels, husband of Shirley Jones, dies at 79
text: > Entertainment Marty Ingels, husband of Shirley Jones, dies at 79 FILE - In this Feb. 14, 1986 file photo, actress Shirley Jones poses with her husband Marty Ingels with a plaque awarding her with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame in Los Angeles. Ingels, a comedian, actor and talent agent who was married to Jones for nearly 40 years, died Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015 in Los Angeles following complications from a stroke. He was 79. (AP Photo/Tweed, File)
